name: Audrick Armchair - Natural
description: This elegant armchair celebrates the natural colors and minimal, relaxed look of Belgian furniture. At OKA, we don't like things being too 'matchy matchy' as Co-Founder Sue Jones says, and so this distinctive piece, with its classic Belgian roll arms, wide and deep seat and curving back, sits perfectly as a standalone armchair, making a statement all on its own. Its legs are removable and will be attached upon delivery.
